mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P_DOC_ANALYZE_LOG ( ID_, EVENT_TYPE, ERROR_EXCEPTION, ERROR_DESC, DOC_NO, DOC_TYPE_CODE, DOC_ORG, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorException,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docOrgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO P_PARSE_TABLE_LOG ( ID_, CREATE_TIME, TABLE_NAME, EMPI_NO, DOC_NO, DATA_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
